Wake up in an unknown world and explore the vast caverns of Lumi.
Find the voice that echoes through your head and discover who you truly are.
    
Delve deeper into its lands full of secrets and traps, fiends and thieves. 
Featuring a world with three major areas that branch out onto multitude of different corners and towns.
            
Help its citizens along your way and meet all sorts of diverse personalities and bug kinds, 
from disciplined butterflies to wise moths, warrior wasps and greedy bees, 
joyful roaches to hardworking beetles, and everything in between. 
    
Master those who oppose you in fast-paced battles, learn new abilites and skills as you grow by finding medals,
and branch out your possibilities. 
    
A metroidvania bullet hell about the light that guides your way.
    
Alpha Demo available Christmas 2023.
